name: Pirate Print
description:
How To Play

Survive for as long as possible while evading the opposing pirates cannonballs

Attack enemies by finishing the sentence on screen

After each time you kill all the enemies the next wave spawns with one extra enemy 

Game Jam

This game was create for Mix And Jam 2020.  The time limit was 2 days, and the theme for it was MIXING GENRES!

Assets Used
  • Fonts - https://www.dafont.com/pirates-ff.font
  • Game Music - The Buccaneer's Haul
  • Main Menu Music - Pirate Crew
  • Ships/Water - Pirate Pack By Kenny
  • Main Menu Background - Cartography Pack By Kenny
  • Game Over/Button Sound Effects - UI Audio By Kenny
